nodes.bodyText: this sleep 100, retryer sleep 1000, Does 1000 affect second-level tasks?
I think 100 or 1000 makes no sense, and doesn't matter. We can't say which interval is appropriate.

If so, it is recommended to be consistent before and after reconstruction.
The original author may have his own consideration.
